page.title: 08Employment
page.content:
Simon's mum works at home. She is a self-employed dressmaker. His father works in Birmingham. He is the manager of a shoe shop. He sometimes travels to work by train but usually by car.
Hayley's dad is self-employed: he works in a butcher's shop in Stoke Golding. He kills and dresses animals ready for them to be sold.
Antony's father is a coal-miner. He works at Donisthorpe Pit a an electrician. He told us that Nuneaton had many more pits 20 years ago than they do today.
Alex's father teaches History at a large comprehensive school in Bedworth. His mother is also a teacher.
